nl.helixsoft.stats.impl

Class AbstractDataFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.stats.impl.AbstractDataFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataFrame
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColumnBoundDataFrame, DefaultDataFrame, MatrixDataFrame

    public abstract class AbstractDataFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataFrame
    Default implementations of some methods that can be implemented without knowing details of the DataFrame implementation.
